title: What CEOs Are Saying: ‘There’s Higher Cyberattack Sensitivity’
sub_head: Leaders from Home Depot, Block, Zscaler and other companies share their thoughts about the Ukraine, inflation and the consumer
body:
Here is a look at what some of the world’s corporate leaders said on their earnings conference calls last week about the situation in Ukraine, inflation and the consumer.
See what business leaders have said in recent weeks on price-sensitive consumers, strategies for pricing and supply-chain issues.
